TNs are going to be cheaper, but IPS will give you better viewing angles, and color accuracy.
Honestly a good TN panel can be just as good as a crappy IPS.
And I doubt it's really all that noticeable, but apparently IPS displays can have more input lag over TN.
Just something to think about possibly.
